00025 DiscreteRandomGeneratorZipf::DiscreteRandomGeneratorZipf(double s)
00026   : DiscreteRandomGenerator(), m_initialized(false), m_s(s)
00027 {
00028   assert(m_s > 0 && m_s < 1);
00029 }
00030 
00031 double DiscreteRandomGeneratorZipf::pmf(uint64_t val)
00032 {
00033   if (!m_initialized) {
00034     m_norm = (1-m_s)/(pow(m_max_val+1, 1-m_s));
00035     m_initialized = true;
00036   }
00037   assert(val>=0 && val <= m_max_val+1);
00038   val++;
00039   double prob = m_norm/pow(val, m_s);
00040   return (prob);
00041 }
